form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tuberville introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require certain membership on the Board of Directors of the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farm Board Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Section 505(a)(2)(G) of the Federal Crop Insurance Act (7 U.S.C. 1505(a)(2)(G)) is amended by striking at least one specialty crop producer. and inserting the following:

clause.text: beginning with the Board of Directors serving on or after May 1, 2027, 1 producer that actively engages in livestock production and crop production of agricultural commodities.
